attributes.action: Protect our green spaces and allotments stop the land grab.
attributes.additional_details: Protect green spaces: they’re vital for carbon capture, flood mitigation, clean air, wildlife habitat, mental health, and local economies. Without parks and fields we lose pollinators, flood control, and havens for community well-being. Once it’s concrete, it’s gone forever. Parliament must act now to safeguard our green fields and our children’s future.
attributes.background:
Demand the council perform a full staffing and overhead audit to identify and eliminate redundant positions and streamline operations.
Demand the council first trims non-essential roles and administrative waste via an efficiency review, rather than forcing the sale of public green spaces.

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Ban councils from selling allotments
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/736003
